（你将从怒火中获得：: 每 1 点怒火使攻击伤害提高 1%

(Inherent effects from having Rage are:: (Virulence is granted by the Herald of Agony Skill)

(Inherent effects from having Rage are:: (Fortify grants 20% reduced Damage Taken from Hits)
